RACE.RACE_TEXT: CHARLES TOWN RACE 1 7F Dirt CR: 82. Claiming Purse 20700. FOR ACCREDITED WEST VIRGINIA-BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 11 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $15,000, if for $12,500, allowed 2 lbs. (Races Wh ere Entered For $10,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SPIRIT OF WINDSOR raced with the pace two deep, challenged toward the seven sixteenths pole and dug in determinedly to eke out the nod over. MR CHANCE ROMANCE in the final strides. The latter raced with the pace inside, dug in to the challenge of Spirit Of Windsor from the seven sixteenths pole, contested the rail on the far turn, dueled gamely to the finish but relented the nod in the final strides. SEATTLE SAILAWAY was shut off shortly after the start then saved ground well off the pace, bid leaving the three eighths pole, raced in the three path on the far turn and came along for third. GET OFF MY CLOUD stalked from the three path, picked up the chase toward the seven sixteenths pole but flattened at the rail on the far turn. ORANGEBURG saved early ground, gave chase nearing the three eighths pole, raced off the rail on the far turn and weakened in the lane. CHIPPEWA'S CASTLE ducked in shortly after the start, rounded the opening turn in the three path and showed little response. ROCKET'S CASTLE settled off the rail on the first turn, showed no response through the backstretch, raced near the rail on the far turn but was eased mid-stretch and vanned off sore.

ENTRY.NAME: Mr Chance Romance
ENTRY.OWNER: Brown Nicole and Brown Ronney W

ENTRY.NAME: Get Off My Cloud
ENTRY.OWNER: A and B Racing Stable LLC

ENTRY.NAME: Rocket's Castle
ENTRY.COMMENT: off rail,no response,rail far turn,eased 1/16,vanned off sore

ENTRY.NAME: Seattle Sailaway
ENTRY.COMMENT: shut off break,saved ground,bid 3/8,3p far turn,along 3rd

ENTRY.NAME: Chippewa's Castle
ENTRY.OWNER: Brown Nicole and Brown Ronney W
ENTRY.COMMENT: ducked in after start,3p 1st turn,little response

RACE.RACE_TEXT: CHARLES TOWN RACE 2 7F Dirt CR: 68. Claiming Purse 13100. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 11 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000, if for $4,500, allowed 2 lbs. NO WVB CLAUSE.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: REDWHITEANDTACOS ducked out and made contact with Kobe's Girl leaving the gate then moved to the inside and rated the pace, was given rein leaving the seven sixteenths pole, widened at the rail on the far turn then only flagged in the lane. PRUSSIAN BLUE rated close inside, gave chase nearing the three eighths pole, rounded the far turn near the rail and dueled through the stretch for second. TOUT ENSEMBLE saved ground, bid past the seven sixteenths pole, raced near the rail on the far turn and was outfinished in the stretch duel for second. IF THEN exchanged contact with Decisive Cause leaving the gate, raced in the three and four paths on the first turn then picked up the chase from the seven sixteenths pole, rounded the far turn about the three path but drifted into the lane and flattened stride. HELLUVA LADY broke awkwardly and was bumped outward and into Decisive Cause, raced off the rail on the first turn and showed little response through the backstretch. I B NASTY was not a factor. GOSSIPING hesitated at the break, raced in the four path on the first turn and showed little response. KOBE'S GIRL was bumped outward and into Helluva Lady leaving the gate then stalked two deep, gave chase nearing the seven sixteenths pole, rounded the far turn two deep and weakened. DECISIVE CAUSE exchanged contact with If Then leaving the gate and was slammed sharply by Helluva Lady shortly afterward, left the first turn outside and showed little response.

ENTRY.NAME: Redwhiteandtacos
ENTRY.OWNER: Stormy Stable LLC and Rebstock John
ENTRY.COMMENT: ducked out,bumped break,rated pace,drew off turn,handily

RACE.RACE_TEXT: CHARLES TOWN RACE 3 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 65. Maiden Special Weight Purse 29400. FOR ACCREDITED WEST VIRGINIA-BRED MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD. Weight, 122 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TURTLE DOVE was firmly rated to set the pace, kept the edge over Lovetheband leaving the seven sixteenths pole, pulled briefly clear past the five sixteenths, raced near the rail on the far turn and held on under steady handling. BAD LINEAGE rounded the first turn about the six path, left the turn outside and picked up the chase from the seven sixteenths pole, raced off the rail on the far turn and dug in through the stretch to take second under the wire. LOVETHEBAND stalked two deep, challenged toward the seven sixteenths pole and raced close off the rail on the far turn, dug in leaving the turn but relented to the winner and was nipped from second under the wire. ZIGGY STARDUST settled off the rail, picked up the chase from the three eighths pole, raced in the three path on the far turn and relented in the duel through the stretch. DR RENDEZVOUS flipped in the gate which necessitated a late rider change, settled off the rail on the first turn, gave chase leaving the half mile pole, raced in the four path on the far turn and flattened in the lane. CRUISE ON BY raced well off the pace inside on the first turn, gave chase leaving the seven sixteenths pole, rounded the far turn off the rail then eased outward toward the head of the lane and showed little more. CHARITABLE WINDSOR stalked three wide on the first turn, gave chase from the three eighths pole then faded in the four path on the far turn. LAST OF BAD BOYS showed little response.

ENTRY.NAME: Cruise On By
ENTRY.COMMENT: well off pace inside,chased 7/16,eased out 1/8,empty lane

ENTRY.NAME: Ziggy Stardust
ENTRY.COMMENT: off rail,chased 3/8,3p far turn,relented stretch duel

ENTRY.NAME: Dr Rendezvous
ENTRY.COMMENT: flipped in gate,off rail 1st turn,chased 1/2,4p far turn,flattene

ENTRY.NAME: Turtle Dove
ENTRY.OWNER: CM Racing and Jones Jr Michael E
ENTRY.COMMENT: firmly rated pace,kept edge from 7/16,rail turn,held on driving

RACE.RACE_TEXT: CHARLES TOWN RACE 4 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 68. Claiming Purse 12000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000, if for $4,500, allowed 2 lbs. (W V A Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MACHEN'S RIDGE rated a slim lead inside, came under pressure leaving the three eighths pole, contested even terms nearest the rail on the far turn and dug in under steady stretch encouragement to hold on. HIS ROYAL G bore out on the opening turn, recovered stride approaching the three eighths pole, raced close in the three path of the far turn but was outfinished in the duel through the stretch. NOTION TO TAPIT saved ground on the first turn, gave chase nearing the three eighths pole, raced near the rail on the far turn and was outfinished in the duel through the stretch. A FAREWELL YODEL saved ground on the first turn, picked up the chase toward the three eighths pole, rounded the far turn about the five path and ran evenly in the lane. BOP MARLEY stalked off the rail the first turn, gave chase from the three eighths pole and contested even terms two deep on the far turn, but dropped back toward mid-stretch and flattened later yards. LEG UP raced three wide on the first turn, gave chase from the three eighths pole, rounded the far turn near the rail and showed little in the lane. ROLL DEM BONES was carried out into the first turn but corrected course midway through the turn, gave chase leaving the seven sixteenths pole, rounded the far turn off the rail and flattened in the lane. ROCK FILE was never a factor. STRINGFELLA was carried wide on the opening turn and showed little response through the backstretch. BABY BULLDOG was not a factor. The Stewards posted the inquiry and disqualified His Royal to ninth place for carrying rivals wide on the first turn.

ENTRY.NAME: dq-His Royal G
ENTRY.OWNER: Pepe Stable and J L M Jacona Stable

ENTRY.NAME: Machen's Ridge
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated slim lead,pressured 3/8,even terms rail turn,held on drving

ENTRY.NAME: Roll Dem Bones
ENTRY.COMMENT: carried out 1st turn,angled in,chased 7/16,off rail turn,flatten

ENTRY.NAME: Baby Bulldog
ENTRY.OWNER: Rose David J and Khalaf Wadie F

ENTRY.NAME: Leg Up
ENTRY.OWNER: Brown Nicole and Brown Ronney W

RACE.RACE_TEXT: CHARLES TOWN RACE 5 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 65. Claiming Purse 19600. FOR ACCREDITED WEST VIRGINIA-BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 11 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $15,000, if for $12,500, allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $10,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).

CLAIM.OWNER: Two Ten Twelve Triple T Racing

RACE.FOOTNOTES: JUBA BABY was forced out leaving the gate and rounded the first turn in the three and four paths, gave chase leaving the half mile pole, raced close off the rail on the far turn, took the lead past the eighth pole and was steadily handled to draw off. IHEARTRAINACOMN ducked out leaving the gate and showed the way early, stalked off the rail into the first turn, picked up the chase from the three eighths pole, rounded the far turn about the three path and came along for second the final strides. IT'S A REAL HONOR took the lead at the rail into the first turn and rated the pace, came under pressure leaving the seven sixteenths pole, rounded the far turn near the rail but was caught past the eighth pole and flattened the final sixteenth. DENALI D'ORO saved ground well off the pace, gave chase leaving the three eighths pole, raced in the five path of the far turn, angled to the outside leaving the turn and passed rivals widest. MAKINLIMMARGARITAS saved ground, picked up the chase nearing the three eighths pole, entered the far turn near the rail but was eased to the five path through the turn and flattened in the lane. APPEALING ROAD rounded the first turn in the four and five paths, picked up the chase from the three eighths pole, raced in the three path of the far turn and showed little in the lane. PETTYFORURTHOUGHTS saved ground on the first turn, gave chase from the seven sixteenths pole, raced in the three path of the far turn and showed little in the lane. GOLDEN SALLY rated close off the rail on the opening turn, gave chase into the backstretch but weakened at the rail on the far turn. AWESOME MOON checked at the rail into the first turn then saved ground.

ENTRY.NAME: Awesome Moon
ENTRY.COMMENT: checked rail into 1st turn, saved ground

ENTRY.NAME: Denali d'Oro
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground,chased 3/8,5p far turn,angled out 1/8,passed rivals

ENTRY.NAME: Iheartrainacomn
ENTRY.COMMENT: ducked out break,stalked off rail,chased 3/8,3p far turn,up 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Juba Baby
ENTRY.COMMENT: forced out break,3& 4p,chased 1/2,up past 1/8,drew off,much best

RACE.RACE_TEXT: CHARLES TOWN RACE 6 4 1/2F Dirt CR: 53. Maiden Special Weight Purse 29400. FOR ACCREDITED WEST VIRGINIA-BRED MAIDENS, FILLIES THREE YEARS OLD. Weight, 122 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: COWGIRL ATTITUDE exchanged contact with Lime Star leaving the gate but took a quick lead and set a pressured pace, drew clear leaving the five sixteenths pole, rounded the turn at the rail and was steadily handled in the stretch. CARMELIZED exchanged contact with Lime Star leaving the gate then pressured the pace, dropped back at the five sixteenths pole but finished well. OPPO TACO gave chase through the backstretch, rounded the turn off the rail and ran evenly in the stretch. SMOKIN LADY pressured the early pace but dropped back at the five sixteenths pole, raced near the rail on the turn and ran evenly in the lane. GHOST OF ALCINA chased inside, rounded the turn near the rail and ran evenly in the stretch. UNALTERED gave distant chase inside and could only improve her position. HARLAN'S VALENTINE chased through the backstretch, raced in the four path on the turn and showed little in the lane. POLISH THE DIAMOND became anxious in the gate, gave chase through the backstretch, raced in the five path on the turn and showed little in the lane. LIME STAR was jostled leaving the gate and never factored.

ENTRY.NAME: Smokin Lady
ENTRY.OWNER: Brown Nicole and Brown Ronney W
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed early pace,dropped back 5/16,rail turn,evenly lane

RACE.RACE_TEXT: CHARLES TOWN RACE 7 4 1/2F Dirt CR: 90. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 31500. FOR ACCREDITED WEST VIRGINIA-BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING OR STARTER SINCE NOVEMBER 11, 2022 OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $20,000. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 11 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since March 11 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $20,000 (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GOLDEN KEY was hustled clear and moved to the inside to rate the pace, came under pressure toward the quarter pole, his rider lost his whip entering the stretch but held on well with an aggressive hand ride. STRONG FIBER chased inside, rounded the turn near the rail and dug in to clear second later yards. PENGUIN POWER chased through the backstretch and rounded the turn near the rail, relented second mid-stretch but held on for third. BUBBA GRUMP angled to the outside to give chase, raced in the five path on the turn, left the turn outside and ran evenly in the lane. JEFFERSON NATIVE exchanged contact with BLACK CANDY leaving the gate then gave chase, raced in range of the lead in the three path on the turn but flattened stride inside the eighth pole. The latter exchanged contact with Jefferson Native leaving the gate then gave chase toward the outside, rounded the turn in the three path and flattened stride in the lane. GRUMPELSTILTSKIN chased the early pace toward mid track and showed little in the lane.

ENTRY.NAME: Grumpelstiltskin
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased mid track, little in lane

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Francis W. Daniel III & Ronney W. Brown

RACE.RACE_TEXT: CHARLES TOWN RACE 8 4 1/2F Dirt CR: 57. Claiming Purse 12000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 11 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000, if for $4,500, allowed 2 lbs. NO WVB CLAUSE.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SHEZA RAJUN CAJUN set a pressured pace inside, contested the edge nearest the rail on the turn and held on well under steady handling. HOWSAFEAREMYCOLORS chased inside, raced at the rail on the turn and dueled through the stretch for second. STOPWATCHSONNY pressured the pace and raced close in the three path of the turn, but was outfinished in the stretch duel for second. BESTLA was bumped outward and into Supersnake leaving the gate then gave chase through the backstretch, rounded the turn near the rail and ran evenly to late stretch before flattening stride. COWGIRL SHINE ducked out and made contact with Bestla leaving the gate then engaged in close chase through the backstretch, remained a factor in the five path through the turn but flattened stride leaving the eighth pole. BRANDYURAFINEGIRL chased, rounded the turn in the four and five paths and passed some rivals. MARSANNE pressured the pace at mostly even terms and raced close in the four path of the turn, but dropped back into the stretch and flattened stride. TWIN CAUSE pressured the pace and raced close off the rail on the turn, but weakened inside the eighth pole. SUPERSNAKE was bumped lightly leaving the gate then chased outside, rounded the turn about the five path and showed little in the lane. JESS FOR KICKS gave chase then flattened in the four path on the turn`.

ENTRY.NAME: Sheza Rajun Cajun
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace,edge rail turn,held well driving

ENTRY.NAME: Twin Cause
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace,close off rail turn,weakened inside 1/8

ENTRY.NAME: Supersnake
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped break,chased outside,5p turn,little in lane
